title: Losing LP in promos?
body: This is a bug please fix because when i lose once in promos im out of it

replies.body:
You always lose LP in promo's? Its been a thing since forever, usually its extremely small tho.
So when you lose 2 games, and failed promo's you can still play 1 more game (if that's a win)
and get right back into promo's.

It's not small depending on the scenario.

eg. Lose 3 win 1 for a promotion series and you can lose 30 LP.
